reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Product is great for those who use lots of sticky notes. Easy to put on edge of computer. Stays on tight. Post it notes stay on. Gives you few extra inches on each side of computer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for post it notes, not for phone
reviews.reviewText: This fit perfectly on my screen and was very easy to install. I will say the bottom part does not have an angle that will support a phone as shown in photos. My phone kept falling forward. Instead I use this part to hold my post it note pad.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Just as expected. Adheres well. Perfect size.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Useful, but problematic sticking
reviews.reviewText: I got the 2-pack for my work computer and my at-home computer. The one at work is perfect because it’s an older computer with a wide border around the screen so the part where it sticks on to the computer blends in and looks seamless. The computer at home however is newer with a very thin border and a wide screen so there’s no where to stick it on. If the adhesive were on the front of the product instead of the back I might be able to secure it onto the back of the computer, but instead I just can’t use it. So perfect product for older computers but if you’ve got a newer one I say just get a phone stand and stick to sticky notes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This memo board is very sturdy, the adhesion is strong and the price is awesome.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Adheres to monitor perfectly.
reviews.reviewText: I love the memo monitor board. It adhered to my computer monitors with no problem. There is some problem with sticky notes adhering to the surface. I have had to tape the sticky notes to the memo board.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Product is what I expected but...
reviews.reviewText: Product came as expected, is sturdy and quality is great. I will use it. The only thing I do not like is the logo/brand of the make is etched on the board. You get two plastic panels. I intended to use one on the right side of both my home and work computer. With the name/logo etched on the clear part it upside on one panel. The maker has one panel for the left side and one for the right. I did not intend to use them both for one monitor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Work very well for monitor notes
reviews.reviewText: just like the pictures, it sticks to the edge of the monitor to add extra room for sticky notes so you're not putting it directly onto the monitor. its the perfect size for adding them to the left, right, and top of the screen for added surface area
